column2: The Mongols arrived less than §Y40§! years ago\n
Has no short-term invasion cooldown in effect\n
The Mongols have NOT yet been defeated\n
The great [Root.GetTitledName] and many of [Root.GetHerHis] [Root.Religion.GetName] vassals have converted and embraced the [convert_province.Religion.GetName] faith!

With the recent split-up of the empire, the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] finds itself within the newly-formed [emf_mongol_heir_1.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] under [emf_mongol_heir_1.GetTitledFirstName]. Whether the same can be said for all of your holdings and vassals will remain to be seen in the days to come.

With the recent split-up of the empire, the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] finds itself within the newly-formed [emf_mongol_heir_2.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] under [emf_mongol_heir_2.GetTitledFirstName]. Whether the same can be said for all of your holdings and vassals will remain to be seen in the days to come.

With the recent split-up of the empire, the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] finds itself within the newly-formed [emf_mongol_heir_3.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] under [emf_mongol_heir_3.GetTitledFirstName]. Whether the same can be said for all of your holdings and vassals will remain to be seen in the days to come.

With the passing of your [GetFromFromRelation], you have been chosen to lead the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] and have been granted the lands and vassals accordingly. As per your [GetFromFromRelation]'s wishes, this means giving up your claims on the other realms...but it also means a chance to establish a dynasty in your own name, one that will take the legacy of your [GetFromFromRelation] and build upon it!

The great [From.GetTitledName], leader of the empire of the Mongols, has died. According to [From.GetHerHis] last wishes, [From.GetSheHe] has split the Mongol horde into three parts: one in the north to be led by [emf_mongol_heir_1.GetTitledFirstName], one in the south to be led by [emf_mongol_heir_2.GetTitledFirstName], and the remaining lands in distant Transoxania to be led by [emf_mongol_heir_3.GetTitledFirstName]. All of the western world waits with bated breath to see if these men will begin a renewed siege upon their lands, or whether they will fall into infighting and civil war.
This is how it shall be
Hopefully this means a reprieve is at hand
